AlreadyExistingNodeException - Exception in org.relationlearn.exception
Exception thrown when trying to add an already existing node to any RelationDigraph implementation.
AlreadyExistingNodeException() - Constructor for exception org.relationlearn.exception.AlreadyExistingNodeException
 
ArgumentNode - Interface in org.relationlearn.model
The ArgumentNode interface represents a text message in a given message board with additional parameters to help it being identified from other messages in a RelationDigraph instace.
ArgumentRelation - Interface in org.relationlearn.model
The ArgumentRelation interface represents the link between two ArgumentNode objects and ultimately stores the RelationType value, which describes what kind of relation those nodes have.
